pr_title: Fix confusion matrix computation for classification function

timeline.bodyText: Could you also define falseNegative before calculating miss rate,  to be consistent with that in TestClassificationPrecisionAggregation.java
timeline.author: viczhang861

timeline.bodyText: Did we only test execution path rather than real expected value? Ideally, unit test should exist to catch this error.
timeline.author: viczhang861

replies.bodyText: I think it did test the expected value. But expected values are calculated at runtime, so the computation in unit test and function must keep consistent. Once the basic definition is wrong, we can't catch the error.
replies.author: fornaix
